description:
Shiryu is recovering under the wing of the Rooshi in the Goroho, China. Nursed by Shunrei, Shiryu’s scares heal but there is no sign of his sight returning. One day, an old enemy, Ohoko, returns to challenge Shiryu. As Children, they had both studied under Rooshi, but Ohko had been expelled. When Ohko realizes that Shiryu cann’t see, he leaves despite Shiryu’s plea that he continue the battle and not show any mercy. Feeling beaten and frustrated, Shiryu goes off find some way in which he can return to his old self. Meanwhile. Seiya goes off to Jamiel in order to find a sure for Shiryu’s eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryuuko Gekitotsu! Hikarinaki Dragon no Namida
The fight between dragon and tiger! The tears without light of dragon
¡Choque entre tigre y dragón! Las lágrimas del Dragón privado de luz
龍虎激突! 光なきドラゴンの涙
